summary: A mutated snake escapes from a laboratory and terrorizes the residents of a small California brewery town.
cast: Pat Morita|Scott Hillenbrand|Casey Fallo|Hoyt Axton|Joseph Ruskin|Courtney Gains|Eric Lawson|Arell Blanton|Jerry Kernion|Michael Leopard|Erik Estrada|Nick Jameson|Cedric Duplechain|Paul Morgan Fredrix|Gary Bristow|Lang Yun|Catalina Larranaga|Megan Blake|Michael Elton|Hailey Russo|Scot Boland|Efren Ramirez|Iyari Limon|Judith Montgomery|Concetta D'Agnese|Chadwick Palmatier|Eric Anderson|Ben Madden|Gerald Henderson
title: King Cobra
